# OneTimeChargeItem

**Object**

The details of a one-time charge product, including its display name, price, SKU, and metadata.

## Declaration

```swift
object OneTimeChargeItem
```

## One-time charge creation in the app

- **OneTimeChargeCreateRequest**: The request data your app provides when a customer purchases a one-time-charge product.
